name: Samurai Spirit
description:
[student project from 2016]

You are the last samurai standing. An army of knights lie between you and the opposing general. You have to use all the weapons at your disposal - katanas, smoke bombs, shurikens, and nagitanas - to march through bloody bodies and claim your revenge.

Make sure you watch your stamina though. It will gradually decrease unless you're standing still. If it runs out, you lose.

Controls displayed in-game. Keyboard and mouse.

Art is from Fire Emblem. Music from Incompetech.
